title: Northern Liberties - Available June 1st!
description:
1 bedroom apartment in Northern Liberties available June 1st! Quiet walk-up, great neighborhood, walking distance to bars/restaurants, and a coffee shop downstairs. The apartment has hardwood floors, updated appliances, tons of natural sunlight, large closets (4), roof-top access, and an in-unit washer/dryer. The landlord is responsive and keeps the place up. Parking is generally easy to find in the area. If I wasn't moving to LA, I would be renewing the lease!!!
If this matters to you, I edited an epic docu-series in here, so there's great creative vibes waiting for you.
SERIOUS INQUIRIES ONLY.
This place will go fast, if you're interested reply by email with:
- Full Name
- Occupation
- Dates/Times available for in-person or virtual tour
- Contact Info
TOURS
Available the first and second weeks in May, but first-come first-serve. If you're interested, don't wait!

AS SEEN IN PICTURES

title: No lease. Weekly rates starting at $556.
description:
A budget-friendly extended stay hotel in Bethlehem, PA
We invite you to experience the conveniences of home at WoodSpring Suites® Allentown Bethlehem. Our all-suite hotel with in-room kitchens is the perfect choice for your extended stay, whether it’s for a week, a month, or longer. We offer low nightly, weekly, and monthly hotel rates to help save you money. Plus, you'll enjoy free WiFi, guest laundry facilities and free parking at our 100% smoke-free, pet-friendly property, making your stay simple and hassle-free.
You'll enjoy quick access to a variety of destinations and attractions when you stay at our hotel in Bethlehem, Pennsylvania. If you’d like to take advantage of public transportation, we're right on the 108, 217, 319, and 327 local LANta bus routes, while the Amtrak Bus Station is just 6 miles away. We're about 8 miles from the Lehigh Valley International Airport/ABE Airport. $50 to $100 Deposit.
Hotel at a Glance
5 miles to Lehigh Valley Hospital Muhlenberg
6 miles to St. Luke’s Hospital Anderson Campus
6 miles to Greyhound and Amtrak stations
8 miles to Lehigh Valley International Airport
Nightly, weekly and monthly hotel rates
Full kitchen in every room
Guest Rooms
Visit our extended stay hotel and select the suite layout that meets your needs. Each layout features a combination of double-/full-sized beds and sleeper sofas, as well as a dresser, nightstand and shelves. All suites also include a kitchen with full-size refrigerator, stovetop, microwave, cupboards and prep sink. Sit back and relax during your stay while enjoying free WiFi and a flat-screen TV with cable/satellite and a premium movie channel. Every-other-week housekeeping services are provided for long-stay guests. Additional items—including a linen exchange, cookware, dishes, and more frequent housekeeping—are available for purchase at the front desk.
Explore activities for all ages in Allentown Bethlehem
You're in the heart of it all when you stay at WoodSpring Suites in Allentown Bethlehem, where you'll find a variety of exciting attractions and destinations. History buffs will enjoy visiting the nearby Pennsbury Manor, the reconstructed estate of William Penn, who founded the Pennsylvania colony. We're also an easy drive to a number of family friendly activities, including Crayola Experience, Dorney Park and Wildwater Kingdom, and Lehigh Valley Zoo. Artists and creative types will want to check out the Banana Factory Arts Center, a collection of galleries and arts programs partly housed in a former banana distribution warehouse, about 9 miles away.
Show Less
Pet Policy
Service animals are welcome at no additional charge, must be registered at front desk. Limit 2 dogs, under 75 lbs. per room. No cats. Non-refundable pet fees, 50 USD a pet reg fee and 10 USD a pet per night charge for the duration of the stay.
Hotel Alert: Some hotel features and amenities may be modified or unavailable due to COVID-19. For more information, please call your hotel directly.
Amenities to help you stay awhile
WoodSpring Suites is an extended stay hotel with clean and comfortable rooms, and a professional, friendly staff that’s available to assist you 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. Our 100% smoke-free hotel offers pet-friendly hotel rooms, free parking, guest laundry facilities and conveniently located vending machines. Daily, weekly and monthly hotel rates are available.

title: Brand New 1 BR in Roxborough
description: New Construction Completed in November 2021, the Property was constructed by an experienced builder with deep expertise in the local market, featuring high-end residential finishes such as granite counters, stainless steel appliances, undermount sinks with push-button garbage disposals, gooseneck faucets, luxury vinyl plank flooring, in-unit washer/dryers, subway tile backsplashes, oversize closets, spacious bathrooms, and large windows. The Property contains luxury amenities such as a state-of-the-art intercom system with key-fob entry, ample closet space, and an eco-friendly green roof providing stormwater management and views of Roxborough, Manayunk, Bala Cynwyd and the Schuylkill River. Transit Oriented The Property is ¼ mile (a 5-minute walk) to Septa's Wissahickon train station, part of the regional rail line on the popular Manayunk-Norristown Line. It is also less than one mile from the onramp of the City Avenue interchange of I-76, providing convenient access Center City Philadelphia and all of Montgomery County, including all of the region's major office markets. Thriving Neighborhood The Roxborough submarket has received a significant influx of high-income renters who remain attracted to the neighborhood's affordability and manageable comminuting times, both to Center City and to suburban white-collar employment centers around Bala Cynwyd and King of Prussia. Additionally, Main Street Manayunk is less than ½ mile from the Property, which offers even more retail, dining and nightlife options including over 50 shops and 30 restaurants. Parking (optional) There are 20 covered reserved spaces at $150/month Water Fees (required) Pet Friendly (fees apply)

description:
Lovely fully remodeled 2 stories, 2 bedroom house on Collins Street between Lehigh and Huntingdon, just across Kensington Courts Community. House has New Hardwood floors, an all-New Kitchen and Bath, and great natural light. The second bedroom has a built-in new closet fixture. Enter into an open space with a New Wood Stair to the second floor. The kitchen is completely redone! The property has a large extra yard in the rear! The entire house has fresh walls and drywall, has been newly painted, with new modern kitchen cabinets, appliances, floors, and Stylish tile backsplash, and a new window for plenty of fresh natural light. The bathroom is completely new and Fully Tiled, with a new Stall Shower that has a Multi-Function Multi-Directional Massaging Shower Bank! This area is the booming East Kensington neighborhood - It is just a short distance to the exciting Fishtown corridor and Center City with multiple entertainments, bars, and restaurant choices. Very convenient to transportation to Center City, great shopping, and amazing green spaces like Aramingo Square. The living and dining areas flow nicely into a very well-designed and new kitchen. This galley-style kitchen with Stainless-Steel Appliances boasts custom cabinetry and access to a nice outdoor area to the rear private back patio of the home. Head out to the large private patio that can fit a grill, chairs, and patio table, perfect for socially distanced hangouts or gardening. The clean basement will be excellent for storage, a full basement with a washer and dryer, and more. Very cool home, a must-see home. Please come see this one before someone else gets it!!
